casebody.data:
MEARES
v.
DANA CORPORATION, et al. No. 502P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 12, 2008. Margaret M. Kingston, Charlotte, for Dana Corporation, et al. Vernon Sumwalt, Charlotte, for Meares.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 666 S.E.2d 819.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of November 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of November 2008."
